p: The PXRD analysis was performed to measure the crystallinity of the powders. Diffractograms were collected using an X-ray diffractometer (Bruker D8 Advance, Bruker AXS Inc., Madison, AL, USA). Powders were irradiated with monochromatized CuK α radiation ( λ = 1.54 Å) and were inspected at a tube voltage of 40 kV and a tube current of 40 mA at a scan speed of 0.1 s/step in a 2 θ angle range of 3°–40°.
